document.full_text: over the past two weeks, japanese government officials and tokyo electric power executives have repeatedly described the deadly combination of the most powerful quake in japan's history and the massive tsunami that followed as "soteigai," or beyond expectations.
document.title: special report: how japan lost calculated nuclear risk
lines_and_colors: over the past two weeks, japanese government officials and tokyo electric power executives have repeatedly described the deadly combination of the most powerful quake in japan's history and the massive tsunami that followed as "soteigai," or beyond expectations.
